component.name: org.nuxeo.runtime.avro
component.documentation: The Avro component. It provides services - that allow to register and retrieve schemas - that allow to create Avro schemas from custom types - that allow to map Avro records from/to custom types

extension-point.name: schema
extension-point.documentation: Allows to register an Avro schema file with a name.

extension-point.name: factory
extension-point.documentation: Allows to register an Avro Factory implementation dedicated to a custom type.

extension-point.name: replacement
extension-point.documentation: Allows to register a replacement scheme for any string not supported by Avro.

extension-point.name: mapper
extension-point.documentation: Allows to register an Avro Mapper implementation dedicated to a custom type.
